1.0.name: wordpress/column-inches
1.0.description:
Adds a column to the Edit Posts page and on the Post edit page with the number of columns inches that the content in the post takes up in a print edition. Multiple column inch counts can be specified for different print sizes. The number of words per column inch is defined via the settings page (defaulted to 20).

This is often useful to print news media that uses WordPress for budgeting stories.
